name: MALAK
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText:
I hope today brings you HAPPINESS and JOY,
            as you truly deserve it. I wanted to take a moment to let you know
            how much I appreciate the time we‚Äôve shared together. You've brought
            so much positivity and joy into my life, and I will always be grateful
            for your kindness and the memories we‚Äôve created. I apologize that I can be impatient and clingy, but I respect your need for space.
            and want you to know that I‚Äôm wishing you the best as you continue to focus on your

            I hope you have a wonderful year ahead, filled with GROWTH, SUCCESS,
            and HAPPINESS. You are such an amazing soul and know that You are
            living rent free in my mind. ;)|

            God knows whats ahead, but I pray it's the best for both of us.
            Once again This is your very special day keep smiling it sunnah too,
            and WELCOME TO ADULTHOODüíïüéâüéÇ‚ù§Ô∏è

textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
